articles.content: Zomato Ltd has begun its post-listing journey with far less transparency compared to the high benchmark it set during its public offering of shares last month. When it courted investors for the 9,375… [+3333 chars]

articles.title: Exxaro Tiles IPO: Allotment date, how to check application status & GMP - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: After the finalisation of allotment, the funds will be refunded to ineligible bidders on August 12 and equity shares will be credited to demat accounts of eligible investors on August 13.
